snippet.title: Swift: Firebase 3 - How to Fetch Users from Database (Ep 4)
snippet.description:
Now is where things get really exciting as we are ready to perform some data fetching from our Firebase Database.  First, I'll show you how to perform a simple single fetch of the current logged in user's name.  Next, we'll construct a more complicated tableview of users to demonstrate how to fetch a list of items from the database.

Part 1 - How to Create a Login Page: https://youtu.be/lWSc0wHFTXM
Part 2 - SDK Installation using CocoaPods: https://youtu.be/guFW9aj4EHM
Part 3 - Email Password Login: https://youtu.be/4rNtIeC_dsQ

Completed Source Code - Download Project Link
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/firebase-chat-messenger

Want to learn more about iOS Development? Here are a few additional playlist resources that are on my channel:

Lets Build YouTube series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JGKdVUtA5xds1zcyzsz7HLj

Lets Build Facebook Feed series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JHDWIO3x4wePhD8G4d1Fa6N

Lets Build Facebook Messenger series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JHGoEg41IJNk9QQ_hPWcyRo

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
